    • Analysis with complex networks

transition_network

Source: R/transition_network.R
transition_network.Rd

Create transition network

transition_network(ts, lag, embedding)

Value

Transition network as igraph object.

Examples

transition_network(rnorm(100), 2, 5)
#> IGRAPH 15855e9 DN-- 6 34 -- 
#> + attr: name (v/c), weigth (v/n), weigth (e/n)
#> + edges from 15855e9 (vertex names):
#>  [1] 123->123 123->132 123->213 123->231 123->312 123->321 132->123 132->132
#>  [9] 132->213 132->231 132->312 132->321 213->123 213->132 213->213 213->231
#> [17] 213->312 213->321 231->123 231->132 231->213 231->231 231->312 231->321
#> [25] 312->123 312->132 312->213 312->231 312->321 321->123 321->132 321->213
#> [33] 321->231 321->312
